website_summaries.verdict: This series expands the realm of Magic with a horde of vicious raptors, soaring pterosaurs, and other epic reptiles to shred your competition to bits.
pros: Includes 36 booster packs, with 540 total cards
196 cards to collect in this series, with a focus on jungle explorers, ruthless pirates, brutal warriors, and tons of killer dinosaurs
cons: Even with 540 cards, you still may not find all 196 cards in the “Rivals of Ixalan” expansion in the booster box

customer_reviews.title: We were disappointed with the product
customer_reviews.text: The package received had open slots in the bottom of 20 out of 36 packs. We were disappointed with the product. We do not recommend this product or seller. Our experience was less than favorable.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sykes

customer_reviews.title: What a rush.
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, the package came perfectly sealed, and was ad advertised with 36 booster packs. I debated buying a booster box for a while. It's simply not an efficient way to acquire ~500 cards, I was assured. Well, I can tell you that the feeling of opening 36 packs is the reason I like magic. It was incredible, and I recommend the experience to anybody who feels that an hour or two rush of excitement (It takes a while to open them all) is well worth $80. It may not be the most cost effective way to acquire ~30 rares and ~5 mythics, but nothing about MTG is cost effective, so just do it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: This is a re-seal but you will get mythics.
customer_reviews.text: So this was definitely a re-seal- no doubt about that. I found a piece of tape on the underneath of the box but they hide it in Wizards of the Coast plastic seal so you think it’s legit. I got $68 of value in rares back from the $80 box which was more than the box from my card shop got me. But there were lands in there from Ixalan (see the the photos from above- actually got 2 of Zacama). So you be the judge of what you want to do I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Cole

customer_reviews.title: Pulled a Rekindling in the second to last pack
customer_reviews.text: I was initially concerned by the reviews suggesting the packs may be tampered with. I went through most of the box without getting anything impressive and felt the earlier concerns were justified. Then, in my second to last pack, I pulled a Rekindling Phoenix. I'm happy with the overall value of the box relative to what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great price, fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Great price! This was just what my friends and I needed to have a Friday Night Magic night of our own. 9 packs a piece, lots of fun, and some really good cards. I was a little disappointed that the box came pretty dinged up on one corner, but it didn't seem to affect the packs.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob & Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Rivals of Ixalan
customer_reviews.text: I usually support my local game store, but couldn't pass this up at the price I got it at! It's a fun series with amazing artwork. Lots of great pulls!
customer_reviews.author: Gary V.

customer_reviews.title: I can't complain about the cards I pulled from this ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't complain about the cards I pulled from this box! I got my elder dinosaurs and a decent amount of foils and mythics. No Planeswalkers, though.
customer_reviews.author: Sydnee Davidson

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY FROM SUPER STUFF!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: RECENTLY BOUGHT THIS BOOSTER BOX AND EVERY PACK HAD A LITTLE SLIT IN IT AND HAD BEEN GONE THROUGH!!!!!!!! NOTHING OF VALUE IN BOX!!!!!!! BUYER BEWARE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: carlos robert backus jr.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived in great shape and I have enjoyed the time spent creating new battle decks.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Prentice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super fun opening packs. Best price I could find. Got some great cards.
customer_reviews.author: J T

customer_reviews.title: Brand new!
customer_reviews.text: All was enclosed in plastic and brand new, in great condition......would order from this vendor again
customer_reviews.author: Delaney-Finn

customer_reviews.title: Got some good pulls. All in all a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Descent price. Got some good pulls. All in all a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: JerNich

customer_reviews.title: Another good set to have on hand
customer_reviews.text: Good condition decent cards I just like to get as many sets and cards as possible. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Crazy good box for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome booster box and the price was crazy low! Got my rekindling Phoenix and a couple other mythical and 2 or 3 plainswalkers.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Factory sealed booster box.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Factory sealed booster box, and it was delivered the same day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how this can get anything but 5 stars. The item is exactly what it is listed as.
customer_reviews.author: thebearded_1

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: Got everything sealed and in a timely manner. Will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i got it today sat 21 of july thanks very much
customer_reviews.author: Jose M. Santos

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: This expansion set is a lot of fun to play!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Gish

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great product that comes exactly as advertised. The box came slightly damaged but that was during delivery itself. I got great cards and reccomend this company/product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: Came quick, got some great cards at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun cards
customer_reviews.text: I got some pretty powerful cards out of it was worth the buy for me and I actually didn't get a lot of repeats
customer_reviews.author: kristopher P troup

customer_reviews.title: Resealed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Every singe pack has been resealed, you can see the tears in the packs from the picture above. They didn't even bother trying to reseal from the bottom they were all reglued at the top of the pack....
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Met expectations
customer_reviews.text: Excellent condition. Shipped on time. Got some good cards. I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Monnich

customer_reviews.title: This was sooooooo much fun to open
customer_reviews.text: This was sooooooo much fun to open! Great deal on booster packs and I basically built a decent merfolk deck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Magen Carothers

customer_reviews.title: Probably, is a defect box
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I got a defect product , it only contain one mythic rare. And the booster packs packing somehow hard to open.
customer_reviews.author: Hon

customer_reviews.title: awesome purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: just what the Dr. ordered and was delivered faster then stated, loved that!! everything came in a safe and sound. would definitely buy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kurai Bastet

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product arrived on time in great shape pulled 5 mythics, 1 planeswalker
customer_reviews.author: Damien Marak

customer_reviews.title: More Dinos?  Yes please!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool expansion from the last set (Explorers of Ixalan) building decently on the themes and tribes (predominantly dinos, vamps, pirates, and merfolk... with the odd human or beast here and there), though some of the commons are the same between the two sets (including artwork). On the seller, they got the box to me intact, quickly, and even with a cute Channel Fireball custom thopter token thrown in for free as an unexpected bonus. A+
customer_reviews.author: Ian Mochow

customer_reviews.title: The packs have been tampered with
customer_reviews.text: It's obvious that all the packs have been opened and resealed.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Royal

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Box came factory sealed as described, what else can I say.
customer_reviews.author: MTG MIKE

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a day early, factory sealed bunch of rares couple mythics good buy
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great factory sealed product. Arrived same day and great pulls!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Same box 2 sets inside the packs
customer_reviews.text: So I thought it was a low ratio of mythic but I understand that it could be a random luck thing. During the opening of the packs they were super easy to open.... like easier than any packs I've ever opened. Also! Lands and tokens are from both ixalan and rivals of ixalan. I still have half a box left to open, and I'm going to buy 3 more store boosters to see if more of the mixed land and token happens in store bought boosters. I've seen reviews that say these guys repack. And reviews that say they dont. ... I'm not sure? Would wizard pack lands and tokens this way?????
customer_reviews.author: Matt B.

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty cool set
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty cool set. My only real complain is that in two boxes of boosters, I would hope to find 3 Planeswalkers. There was only one in each box. So far, in buying booster boxes over the last two years, I'm really only finding rare cases where there are 2 Planewalkers in a box. I'm not fond of the addition of stupid ad cards and now only having really 14 playable cards per pack is a sneaky way to raise the prices. These did provide for a competitive draft tournament though.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Moran

customer_reviews.title: Repackaged
customer_reviews.text: Came earlier than expected which was awesome. But upon opening the box and looking at the packs, everyone of them was split at the top and bottom, so it takes the excitement out of opening. Luckily I'm recently back into magic and collecting the set, only reason I'd buy this product. I'll just keep going to my local game store and at least giving myself a shot at something great.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: These are 36 Magic Booster packs from Rivals of Ixalan
customer_reviews.text: There's literally 36 booster packs in there! That's fricken amazing... and every one of them is a Magic card! So excited to open them, but I probably won't let Jason open any unless he has a tea or 2, cause he cheats!
customer_reviews.author: Karlos Kistaman

customer_reviews.title: MTG Rivals of lxalan
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these cards. Did a lot of yard work to earn these ans it was well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

product_meta.title: Magic The Gathering Rivals of Ixalan Booster Box | 36 Booster Packs (540 Cards)
product_meta.description: A booster box contains 36 booster packs of Rivals of Ixalan. Each booster pack contains 15 magic cards (540 cards total). pick your favorites, put them in your deck, and battle!
feature_bullets: BUILD DECKS. A booster box contains 36 booster packs of Rivals of Ixalan. Each booster pack contains 15 Magic cards (540 cards total). Pick your favorites, put them in your deck, and battle!

FILL YOUR BINDER. Rivals of Ixalan includes planeswalkers like Angrath, the Flame-Chained, and some of the biggest creatures ever printed, like Ghalta, Primal Hunger. (Note: cards listed are representative and not necessarily the cards you will receive.)

PLAY AT HOME. Your Rivals of Ixalan booster box holds enough packs to host your own booster draft with as many as twelve friends. (Note: a booster draft requires more basic land cards than a booster box includes.)

PLAY THE ORIGINAL. Magic: The Gathering is the first modern collectible card game. Magic has inspired more than 20 million fans over 25 years, from the first dragons and angels to today’s planeswalkers and Commander decks.

JOIN THE FAMILY. Wizards of the Coast has been making the world’s best strategy games for almost 30 years: Magic: The Gathering (MTG), Dungeons & Dragons (D&D), many board games under the Avalon Hill umbrella, and more. Explore them all, discover new favorites, and make new friends along the way.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars112 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
